meanings.definition: A glass container, typically containing soil and plants, used for growing and displaying plants indoors.
meanings.sent1: My mom has a beautiful terrarium on the windowsill with tiny plants.
meanings.sent2: The science classroom had several terrariums filled with greenery.
meanings.sent3: The terrarium on the shelf looked like a mini jungle!
meanings.sent4: Her terrariums were like miniature worlds, each with its own ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The terrarium sparkled in the sunlight, showcasing its lush inhabitants.

meanings.definition: A sealed transparent globe or similar container in which plants are grown.
meanings.sent1: The terrarium on the table was a perfect little ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: Children enjoyed watching the plants grow inside the terrarium.
meanings.sent3: The terrarium rolled off the shelf and bounced down the stairs!
meanings.sent4: The terrarium was a tiny universe, sealed off from the outside world.
meanings.sent5: Peering into the terrarium felt like looking through a magical portal.
